name: Animequotes
0:
”Alexa, open Anime quotes”
”Next”
”Alexa, launch Anime quotes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: anime quotes
des: Anime has a lot of Wisdom in it. If you watch Anime regularly then you should know this. With this Skill, you can simply ask Alexa to tell you a quote from an Anime, and boom it will tell you one. This allows you to gain a small amount of the Wisdom contained inside of Anime.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
